ussr.physics.jme
Class JMEBasicGraphicalSimulation

java.lang.Object
  com.jme.app.AbstractGame
      ussr.physics.jme.JMEBasicGraphicalSimulation
Direct Known Subclasses:
JMESimulation
public abstract class JMEBasicGraphicalSimulation
extends com.jme.app.AbstractGame

The basic graphical and user interface elements of a simulation. Declares certain field that are used in JMESimulation to define the behavior of the physical simulation.

Author:
Modular Robots @ MMMI
